title: SIKTH Announces Two Shows Celebrating Their 2006 Record Death Of A Dead Day
description: Both happening in February 2026. The post SIKTH Announces Two Shows Celebrating Their 2006 Record Death Of A Dead Day appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 7 hours ago
text: Sikth – currently their classic lineup of Mikee Goodman, Dan Weller, Graham "Pin" Pinney, Dan "Loord" Foord, James Leach, and Justin Hill – is set to return in 2026 for two very special shows in the UK! Sikth will perform their 2006 album Death of a Dead Day in full at two 20th anniversary shows in Manchester and London. Both shows will be opened by Heriot. Here's hoping this also means Sikth is returning to being a band a little more than they are, as Sikth has historically always ruled. Those two dates are: 2/25 Manchester, UK Academy 22/28 London, UK O2 Forum Kentish Town Want More Metal? Sikth – currently their classic lineup of Mikee Goodman, Dan Weller, Graham "Pin" Pinney, Dan "Loord" Foord, James Leach, and Justin Hill – is set to return in 2026 for two very special shows in the UK! Sikth will perform their 2006 album Death of a Dead Day in full at two 20th anniversary shows in Manchester and London.

Both shows will be opened by Heriot. Here's hoping this also means Sikth is returning to being a band a little more than they are, as Sikth has historically always ruled. Those two dates are:
